name: Vinsmoke Reiju
text: On Play: If you have equal to or less DON!! on your field than you opponent, and if you have 5 or less cards in hand, draw 2 cards.

effect.text: If you have equal to or less DON!! on your field than you opponent, and if you have 5 or less cards in hand, draw 2 cards.
conditions: equal to or less DON!! on your field than you opponent
you have 5 or less cards in hand
